description: Cruzer Titanium is an extremely rugged, fast and smart USB Flash Drive (UFD). Built with a crush-resistant case that can withstand over 2,000 pounds, the Cruzer Titanium has lightning fast performance speeds of up to 15MB/s.
title: Sandisk 8GB Cruzer Titanium USB 2.0 Flash Drive (SDCZ7-8192-A11, Retail Package)
